pattern

protected java.util.regex.Pattern pattern
The compiled pattern.

groupOperations

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object> groupOperations
The key is the group number (see Matcher) of the matched result.

The value can either be a string or a RegExpRule:

  • If it is a string, it should be one of the style key from syntaxhighlighter.theme.
    The style will be applied to the 'strip of string related to the group number'.
  • If it is a RegExpRule, the RegExpRule will be applied on the 'strip of string related to the group number' for further operations/matching.

bold

protected java.lang.Boolean bold
Set 'bold the matched results' or not. Null means don't set this, remain default.

getBold

public java.lang.Boolean getBold()
Get whether bold the matched result or not.

Returns:
true means bold it, false means dun bold, null mean neither bold nor not bold (remain default)

Set bold the matched results or not. Null means remain default.
